column1: Local Foods////Went after work for dinner
column2: Â only two tables had other people
column3: and they sat us at the closest table to restrooms. Literally 5 feet from them. Constantly shooing flys away while eating
column4: one even landed in my drink
column5: food too mediocre for the price
column6: waiter said all margaritas were happy hour price but then charged us for regular price. Overall not worth the money. Would never go back.
